医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
全球儿童糖尿病发病率激增研究人员调查了儿童糖尿病发病率的全球趋势以及导致其发病的不同因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Childhood-diabetes-rates-surge-globally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Childhood-diabetes-rates-surge-globally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=789beb5b-075a-4b9e-b1d3-351e6de7ff34 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 17:03:00 -0500 Childhood diabetes rates surge globally
衰老通过限制细胞再生来降低癌症风险研究人员越来越多地了解到，对于癌症而言，衰老是一把双刃剑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Aging-reduces-cancer-risk-by-limiting-cell-regenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Aging-reduces-cancer-risk-by-limiting-cell-regenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22d5d6ce-12c1-4925-be77-404e4447d497 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 14:34:00 -0500 Aging reduces cancer risk by limiting cell regeneration
由于动物产品摄入量低，埃塞俄比亚儿童面临营养不良问题负担能力和缺乏意识导致埃塞俄比亚儿童对动物产品的消费量较低，促使专家制定干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Ethiopian-children-struggle-with-malnutrition-due-to-low-animal-product-intake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Ethiopian-children-struggle-with-malnutrition-due-to-low-animal-product-intake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=769b6a1f-339d-44ae-a65c-a8961052d400 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 14:29:35 -0500 Ethiopian children struggle with malnutrition due to low animal product intake
大学生孤独感超过屏幕时间导致失眠俄勒冈州立大学的一项新研究表明，对于大学生来说，与长时间坐在电脑或其他电子屏幕前相比，孤独是影响他们睡个好觉的更大障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/College-studentse28099-loneiness-outweighs-screen-time-in-causing-insomnia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/College-studentse28099-loneiness-outweighs-screen-time-in-causing-insomnia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c053ce9-91c2-4cbe-ba04-6f0720fe613a Wed, 04 Dec 2024 14:16:34 -0500 College students’ loneliness outweighs screen time in causing insomnia
科学家确定特发性自闭症背后的分子机制自闭症是一种神经发育障碍，其特征是沟通和社交行为困难。大约 20% 的病例与特定基因突变有关，但其余 80% 的病例（称为特发性自闭症）的起源仍然是个谜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Scientists-identify-molecular-mechanism-behind-idiopathic-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Scientists-identify-molecular-mechanism-behind-idiopathic-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8655168d-5fa1-4bb5-81fa-83e95e9888ba Wed, 04 Dec 2024 14:07:36 -0500 Scientists identify molecular mechanism behind idiopathic autism
复原力的大脑特征表明了一种从创伤中恢复的新方法加州大学旧金山分校的研究人员在小鼠身上发现了一种恢复能力的大脑特征，这表明了一种治疗严重抑郁症的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Brain-signature-of-resilience-suggests-a-new-way-to-recovery-from-trauma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Brain-signature-of-resilience-suggests-a-new-way-to-recovery-from-trauma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3807bdde-0a70-4884-bcdd-c54f16256ba5 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 13:43:44 -0500 Brain signature of resilience suggests a new way to recovery from trauma
果糖消耗与癌症模型中肿瘤生长加速有关在过去的五年中，果糖的消费量大幅增加，这主要是由于高果糖玉米糖浆作为饮料和超加工食品中的甜味剂的广泛使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Fructose-conspiration-linked-to-accelerated-tumor-growth-in-cancer-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Fructose-conspiration-linked-to-accelerated-tumor-growth-in-cancer-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d449bdb0-2076-4516-8b01-83f1abd94da9 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 13:31:23 -0500 Fructose consumption linked to accelerated tumor growth in cancer models
超声波控制的 CRISPR 为治疗遗传性疾病提供了精确性借助 CRISPR，我们的医学专家很快就能对如何治疗和预防一些最具挑战性的遗传性疾病和疾病拥有前所未有的控制力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Ultrasound-control-CRISPR-offers- precision-in-treating-genic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Ultrasound-control-CRISPR-offers- precision-in-treating-genic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=466a96e5-513f-4d2d-aed7-56267d21866a Wed, 04 Dec 2024 13:14:00 -0500 Ultrasound-controlled CRISPR offers precision in treating genetic disorders
新发现为治疗侵袭性腺样囊性癌带来了希望2024 年 11 月 22 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新社论，题为“B7-H4：腺样囊性癌的潜在治疗靶点”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-discovery-offers-hope-for-treating-aggressive-adenoid-cystic-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-discovery-offers-hope-for-treating-aggressive-adenoid-cystic-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4e4179f-7e2e-46ce-b6a6-a24ccbb2af6d Wed, 04 Dec 2024 12:56:11 -0500 New discovery offers hope for treating aggressive adenoid cystic carcinoma
慢性阻塞性肺病患者的观点应指导新疗法的开发一篇新评论称，慢性阻塞性肺疾病 (COPD) 患者的观点和优先事项应纳入 COPD 新疗法的开发过程中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/COPD-病人-perspectives-should-guide-development-of-new-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/COPD-病人-perspectives-should-guide-development-of-new-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b16f38c-ddbc-4ac4-b561-a018ff5b623b Wed, 04 Dec 2024 12:42:02 -0500 COPD patients' perspectives should guide development of new therapies
